name: On Cue: Peter Mouses Pan Versus the Cat Brothers
name_original: On Cue: Peter Mouses Pan Versus the Cat Brothers
description:
The "Actors" know what they're supposed to do, but they always forget when to get on stage !
It's your job to tell them when to go, and to make the right play happen. Sounds pretty simple, but without you, nothing would happen. You're kind of joining together the parts of the play *wink wink nudge nudge*.
(You can just tell them to go by pressing the corresponding arrow key)

This game was created for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam by Roman Grzegorzewski (programming and stuff) and Jean Maillard (mostly drawing and some other stuff). Have fun !
